content: Can someone please tell me where is the meeting today? It is at 8:00, right?
Hi @Jose Costa Teixeira, the birds of a feather session about registry & simplifier is scheduled tonight _after_ the corepoint event at 19:30 in St. James. Join us!
@Michel Rutten Will be there, thanks
Missed it, sorry. Are there notes? handouts?
It was mostly a Q&A session, with some live demo elements, to roll out the new simplifier.net and registry.fhir.org capabilities being made available to HL7 workgroups.
